tags: None
review: I’m her patient for more than 7 years now. **** **** ***** ** ********* she guides and suggests natural treatments along with medical support and detailed diagnosis when needed which I like the most. I never saw her being commercial even at a single visit. Always listens and understands patients by giving her time and commitment. Her guidance for my second pregnancy was awesome fruitful despite of many complications! I recommend her to my friends and relatives and hear back my voice about this wonderful doctor from each one of them always! A big thanks to her for being with us all times!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Magnificent!! She is a dynamic lady i have ever met. My 9 months of pregnancy was so easy and every bit of the credit goes to her. She took care of me like a mother, scolded me when i did a wrong and it was a beautiful experience. She listens to query and give her advice and i know she never goes wrong. She is very accommodative. *** ** *** **** ****** ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ********* ******* Its very hard to find a doctor like her now a days. Fully professional, not money minded and very well experienced doctor. Last month we admitted my wife for delivery and blessed with baby girl. *** ****** ********* *** care is awesome. First of all she is very good human being.

review: Doctor is so nice. She makes the patient very comfortable and explains the situation properly. She gives good amount of time to each patient. We are still in process of the doing check ups under her guidance and I am really very happy that I can reach out to her anytime on WhatsApp. I will always recommend the doctor to every one specially to those who moved from another city to Hyderabad and those who don't know where to go.

*** ** **** *** ** ***** *** *** I respect her from the bottom of my heart. She is great doctor. She made my pregnancy so smooth. She is quite experienced, friendly and helpful. I feel so comfortable with her.
I have no words to thank her. Thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: What an amazing doctor! She explains everything in detail and is so polite . She is so friendly that you will come out of her cabin totally stress free. Unfortunately I couldn’t continue with her due to the distance but I so miss being treated by her.  Lovely lady !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Happy with the Doctors care.. It is very hard to find a doctor like her in these days. one will never feel we were talking to a doctor. She explains the things like a mother and guides in natural way than meditative. Not a comercial doctor and the utmost thing is half of the problems will vanish after talking to her, She explains the problems in such a way with positive and most comforting way and what are the best natural ways to eradicate them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
She is just a mother. Today is my 1st consultation after my post surgery (at some other place). She knew I will not be her conitued patient but still she gave her valuable time and explained in detail about what needs to do and what not to do in taking care of my health.I have come back with positive vibe from the hospital

Thank you so much Doctor
